results.title: Bioinformatics analysis of gene and microRNA targets for fibromyalgia.
results.text_hl: There was partial overlap between @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy-related genes and @<m>DISEASE_Fibromyalgia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005356 @@@FM@@@-related genes.

results.title: Metformin: A Prospective Alternative for the Treatment of Chronic Pain
results.text_hl: Interestingly, all these biochemical alterations were restored to control values when bone marrow cells from @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Fibromyalgia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005356 @@@fibromyalgia@@@ are treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

results.title: Metformin and caloric restriction induce an AMPK-dependent restoration of mitochondrial dysfunction in fibroblasts from Fibromyalgia patients.
results.text_hl: Furthermore, both @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and caloric restriction could be an interesting therapeutic approach in @<m>DISEASE_Fibromyalgia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005356 @@@FM@@@.

results.title: AMPK Phosphorylation Modulates Pain by Activation of NLRP3 Inflammasome.
results.text_hl: In addition, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment (200 mg/daily), which increased @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_5563 @@@AMPK@@@ activation, restored all biochemical alterations examined by us in blood cells and significantly improved clinical symptoms, such as, @DISEASE_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@pain@@@, @DISEASE_Fatigue @DISEASE_MESH:D005221 @@@fatigue@@@, @DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D003866 @@@depression@@@, @DISEASE_Sleep_Wake_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D012893 @@@disturbed sleep@@@, and tender @DISEASE_Belonephobia @DISEASE_MESH:C000719195 @@@points@@@, in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Fibromyalgia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005356 @@@FM@@@.
